2.9 Which of the following sets are subspaces of R3?
a. A= {(λ,λ + µ3,λ −µ3) |λ,µ ∈R}
b. B= {(λ2,−λ2,0) |λ∈R}
c. Let γ be in R.
C = {(ξ1,ξ2,ξ3) ∈R3 |ξ1 −2ξ2 + 3ξ3 = γ}
d. D= {(ξ1,ξ2,ξ3) ∈R3 |ξ2 ∈Z}
